query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		staticdashboardelement {
			chart_config {
				allow_limit_override,
				chart_orientation,
				data_axes,
				description,
				disable_table_view_toggle_button,
				display_all_items_in_tooltip,
				display_total_of_all_items_in_tooltip,
				explores,
				hide_chart_card_menu,
				hide_date_range_annotation,
				id,
				index_axis {
					color,
					darkModeColor,
					format,
					hide_when_empty,
					id,
					label,
					lightModeColor,
					query_key,
					select_field,
					tooltip,
					type,
				},
				interval_override,
				key,
				legend_position,
				legend_word_break,
				margin {
					bottom,
					id,
					left,
					right,
					top,
				},
				new_until,
				pivot_axis {
					color,
					darkModeColor,
					format,
					hide_when_empty,
					id,
					label,
					lightModeColor,
					query_key,
					select_field,
					tooltip,
					type,
				},
				stacked,
				subheader_override_text,
				title,
				title_tooltip,
				type,
				url,
			},
			id,
			key,
			markdown,
			template,
			type,
			url,
		}
	}
